<<<<<<< HEAD
A relation of the labour, travail and suffering of that faithful servant of the Lord Alice Curwen Who departed this life the 7th day of the 6th moneth, 1679. and resteth in peace with the Lord. Martindell, Anne.
[20], 55, [1] p.
s.n.], [London : Printed in the year 1680.
By Anne Martindell. Place of publication from Wing. Includes testimonials by her husband, Thomas Curwen, and others. Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
=======
